name: Double Density Data Defender
description:
Double Density Data Defender.
Data gets in the internet from A to B, but how does that work?

This game takes you on a journey on how the internet works.

Controls:
A and D to move
Space to jump
Left click to attack, hold for melee weapon
E to switch weapon
Shift to dash
After rounds your attributes menu is opened. Drag and drop the attributes in your preferred order. (See down below for more information)

Enjoy our game!

Sadly due to the time constrains some features had to be cut. This includes the bar in the bottom right. This bar holds your attributes, these are Speed, Strength and cooldown reduction on attacking. Planned was when you shot or take dmg this bar gets lower and when it gets lower than the attributes you lose the extra stats the for example speed attributes gives you. Right now the attributes increase your stats, but are not decreased.

This game was made during 48 hours. Everything was made during this period.

The game was made by Tazeen and Maax.
